name: ceiled
description: Server and web interface for LEDs on ceiling
author: Bart van Oort

scripts.install: concurrently "cd controller && npm install" "cd ceiled-web && npm install "
scripts.start: concurrently "cd controller && npm start" "cd ceiled-web && npm run serve"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd controller && npm run build" "cd ceiled-web && npm run build "
